```json
{
  "contents": "/**\n * GET /api/tokens/components\n * \n * Returns component tokens (Button, Card, Input, etc.)\n * Query params:\n *   - resolve: 'true' | 'false' (default: 'true') - whether to resolve references\n *   - component: 'Button' | 'Card' | 'Input' - filter by component\n */\n\nimport { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';\nimport {\n  parseComponents,\n  resolveAllTokens,\n  getTokenStats,\n  TokenApiResponse,\n  TokenLayer,\n  TokenType,\n} from '@/lib/tokens';\n\nexport async function GET(request: NextRequest) {\n  try {\n    const searchParams = request.nextUrl.searchParams;\n    const shouldResolve = searchParams.get('resolve') !== 'false';\n    const componentFilter = searchParams.get('component');\n    \n    let tokens = parseComponents();\n    \n    // Filter by component if specified\n    if (componentFilter) {\n      tokens = tokens.filter(t =&gt; t.path.startsWith(componentFilter));\n    }\n    \n    if (shouldResolve) {\n      tokens = resolveAllTokens(tokens);\n    }\n    \n    const stats = getTokenStats(tokens);\n    const types = [...new Set(tokens.map(t =&gt; t.type))] as TokenType[];\n    \n    const response: TokenApiResponse = {\n      collection: 'Components',\n      mode: 'Default',\n      tokens,\n      metadata: {\n        count: tokens.length,\n        types,\n        modes: ['Default'],\n        lastUpdated: new Date().toISOString(),\n        layer: TokenLayer.Components,\n      },\n    };\n    \n    return NextResponse.json(response);\n  } catch (error) {\n    console.error('Error fetching component tokens:', error);\n    return NextResponse.json(\n      { error: 'Failed to fetch component tokens' },\n      { status: 500 }\n    );\n  }\n}\n",
  "totalLinesInFile": 62
}
```

},\n  [TokenLayer.Greenshift]: {\n    layer: TokenLayer.Greenshift,\n    displayName: 'Greenshift',\n    shortName: 'GRS',\n    description: 'WordPress/Greenshift CSS custom properties',\n    order: 5,\n    color: '#6366f1', // indigo-500\n  },\n};\n\n// =============================================================================\n// PARSED/PROCESSED TOKEN TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Parsed token with resolved metadata */\nexport interface ParsedToken {\n  /** Full path: \"Color.Emerald.400\" */\n  path: string;\n  /** Display name: \"Emerald 400\" */\n  name: string;\n  /** Resolved final value: \"#34d399\" or 24 */\n  value: string | number;\n  /** Original value (may be reference): \"{Primitives.modes.Default.Color.Emerald.400}\" */\n  originalValue: string | number;\n  /** Token type */\n  type: TokenType;\n  /** CSS variable name: \"--primitives-color-emerald-400\" */\n  cssVariable: string;\n  /** Collection name */\n  collection: string;\n  /** Mode name */\n  mode: string;\n  /** Token layer */\n  layer: TokenLayer;\n  /** Reference string if value references another token */\n  reference?: TokenReference;\n  /** WordPress variable (Greenshift only) */\n  wpVariable?: string;\n  /** Optional description */\n  description?: string;\n}\n\n/** Token with its full reference chain */\nexport interface TokenWithChain extends ParsedToken {\n  /** Chain of tokens from this token to the primitive value */\n  referenceChain: ParsedToken[];\n  /** Tokens that reference this token */\n  referencedBy: ParsedToken[];\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// REFERENCE CHAIN TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** A single step in a reference chain */\nexport interface ReferenceChainStep {\n  /** The token at this step */\n  token: ParsedToken;\n  /** Position in chain (0 = start, higher = closer to primitive) */\n  depth: number;\n  /** Is this the final resolved value? */\n  isFinal: boolean;\n}\n\n/** Complete reference chain from one token to its primitive source */\nexport interface ReferenceChain {\n  /** Starting token (e.g., Greenshift variable) */\n  source: ParsedToken;\n  /** All steps in the chain */\n  steps: ReferenceChainStep[];\n  /** Final resolved primitive value */\n  resolvedValue: string | number;\n  /** Total chain depth */\n  depth: number;\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// API RESPONSE TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Metadata included in API responses */\nexport interface TokenResponseMetadata {\n  /** Total count of tokens */\n  count: number;\n  /** Token types present */\n  types: TokenType[];\n  /** Modes available */\n  modes: string[];\n  /** Last updated timestamp */\n  lastUpdated: string;\n  /** Layer/collection name */\n  layer: TokenLayer;\n}\n\n/** Standard API response for token endpoints */\nexport interface TokenApiResponse {\n  /** Collection name */\n  collection: string;\n  /** Current mode (if applicable) */\n  mode?: string;\n  /** Array of parsed tokens */\n  tokens: ParsedToken[];\n  /** Response metadata */\n  metadata: TokenResponseMetadata;\n}\n\n/** API response for a single token with full chain */\nexport interface TokenDetailResponse {\n  /** The requested token */\n  token: TokenWithChain;\n  /** Related tokens in same group */\n  siblings?: ParsedToken[];\n}\n\n/** Export format options */\nexport type ExportFormat = 'css' | 'json' | 'figma' | 'wordpress';\n\n/** Export API request */\nexport interface ExportRequest {\n  /** Format to export */\n  format: ExportFormat;\n  /** Mode to export */\n  mode?: string;\n  /** Specific layers to include */\n  layers?: TokenLayer[];\n  /** Include custom overrides */\n  overrides?: Record&lt;string, string | number&gt;;\n}\n\n/** Export API response */\nexport interface ExportResponse {\n  /** Exported content */\n  content: string;\n  /** File extension */\n  extension: string;\n  /** MIME type */\n  mimeType: string;\n  /** Suggested filename */\n  filename: string;\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// FILTER &amp; SEARCH TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Token search/filter criteria */\nexport interface TokenFilter {\n  /** Search query */\n  query?: string;\n  /** Filter by layer(s) */\n  layers?: TokenLayer[];\n  /** Filter by type(s) */\n  types?: TokenType[];\n  /** Filter by mode */\n  mode?: string;\n  /** Filter by category/group */\n  category?: string;\n  /** Only tokens with references */\n  hasReference?: boolean;\n}\n\n/** Grouped token results */\nexport interface TokenGroup {\n  /** Group name/path */\n  name: string;\n  /** Display label */\n  label: string;\n  /** Tokens in this group */\n  tokens: ParsedToken[];\n  /** Subgroups */\n  subgroups?: TokenGroup[];\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// COLOR PALETTE TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Single color swatch */\nexport interface ColorSwatch {\n  /** Shade level (50-950) or name (White, Black) */\n  shade: string;\n  /** Hex color value */\n  hex: string;\n  /** CSS variable name */\n  cssVariable: string;\n  /** Is this a light shade (for text contrast) */\n  isLight: boolean;\n}\n\n/** Complete color family/palette */\nexport interface ColorPalette {\n  /** Family name (Emerald, Blue, etc.) */\n  name: ColorFamily;\n  /** Display name */\n  displayName: string;\n  /** Array of swatches */\n  swatches: ColorSwatch[];\n  /** Category (Neutral, Warm, Cool, etc.) */\n  category: 'neutral' | 'warm' | 'cool' | 'blue' | 'pink' | 'base';\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// SPACING &amp; SIZE TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Spacing token with visual metadata */\nexport interface SpacingToken extends ParsedToken {\n  /** Pixel value */\n  pixels: number;\n  /** Rem value */\n  rem: number;\n  /** Scale key (0, 1, 2, etc.) */\n  scaleKey: string;\n}\n\n/** Radius token with visual metadata */\nexport interface RadiusToken extends ParsedToken {\n  /** Pixel value */\n  pixels: number;\n  /** Scale key (sm, md, lg, etc.) */\n  scaleKey: RadiusKey;\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// COMPONENT TOKEN TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Button component tokens */\nexport interface ButtonTokens {\n  background: {\n    default: ParsedToken;\n    hover: ParsedToken;\n  };\n  text: ParsedToken;\n  radius: ParsedToken;\n  paddingX: ParsedToken;\n  paddingY: ParsedToken;\n  height: {\n    sm: ParsedToken;\n    md: ParsedToken;\n    lg: ParsedToken;\n  };\n  secondary: {\n    background: ParsedToken;\n    backgroundHover: ParsedToken;\n    text: ParsedToken;\n  };\n  outline: {\n    background: ParsedToken;\n    border: ParsedToken;\n    text: ParsedToken;\n    hoverBackground: ParsedToken;\n  };\n}\n\n/** Card component tokens */\nexport interface CardTokens {\n  background: ParsedToken;\n  border: ParsedToken;\n  text: ParsedToken;\n  radius: ParsedToken;\n  padding: ParsedToken;\n}\n\n/** Input component tokens */\nexport interface InputTokens {\n  background: ParsedToken;\n  border: {\n    default: ParsedToken;\n    focus: ParsedToken;\n  };\n  radius: ParsedToken;\n  paddingX: ParsedToken;\n  paddingY: ParsedToken;\n  height: ParsedToken;\n  text: ParsedToken;\n  placeholder: ParsedToken;\n}\n\n// =============================================================================\n// UTILITY TYPES\n// =============================================================================\n\n/** Deep partial type */\nexport type DeepPartial&lt;T&gt; = {\n  [P in keyof T]?: T[P] extends object ? DeepPartial&lt;T[P]&gt; : T[P];\n};\n\n/** Extract keys of type */\nexport type KeysOfType&lt;T, U&gt; = {\n  [K in keyof T]: T[K] extends U ? K : never;\n}[keyof T];\n\n/** CSS variable name format */\nexport type CSSVariableName = &#96;--${string}&#96;;\n\n/** WordPress variable name format */\nexport type WPVariableName = &#96;--wp--${string}&#96;;\n",
```json
  "totalLinesInFile": 548
```
